description: "&nbsp;PG&amp;E is in the final stages of decommissioning the Humboldt Bay Power Plant, the first commerically-licensed nuclear power plant in the U.S. The discarge and intake canals at the King Salmon plant will be remediated to remove contaminated sediment and soil.&nbsp;Click HERE to read our comments on the Mitigated Negative Declaration that will be consider by the Humboldt Bay Harbor, Recreation, and Conservation District on Thursday, Jan. 23, 2014."
